Get men's college basketball AP and Coaches Poll rankings from ESPN

Source: R/espn_mbb_data.R
espn_mbb_rankings.Rd

Get men's college basketball AP and Coaches Poll rankings from ESPN

espn_mbb_rankings()

Value

Returns a tibble

Author

Saiem Gilani

Examples

# Get current AP and Coaches Poll rankings
# \donttest{
  try(espn_mbb_rankings())
#> # A tibble: 91 × 35
#>    id    name   short_name type  headline short_headline current previous points
#>    <chr> <chr>  <chr>      <chr> <chr>    <chr>            <int>    <int>  <dbl>

#>  2 1     AP To… AP Poll    ap    2022 NC… 2022 : Final …       2        2   1470

#>  4 1     AP To… AP Poll    ap    2022 NC… 2022 : Final …       4        3   1286

#>  8 1     AP To… AP Poll    ap    2022 NC… 2022 : Final …       8        4   1144
